verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu kṣaṇeka viśrāma kariyā
snāna karibāre gelā bhakta-gaṇa lañā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṣaṇeka—for some time; viśrāma kariyā—taking rest; snāna karibāre—for bathing; gelā—went; bhakta-gaṇa lañā—taking all the devotees.
translation: After taking rest, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and all the devotees departed to take their baths.
